short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that automatically boosts engagement in StudyStream Focus Rooms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Auto encourage all users in a Focus Room in order to increase engagement, gather pins and easily make the front page

How to use:
1. From the extension page click "Add to Chrome" 
2. Navigate to a StudyStream Focus Room (Make sure you're on the first page)
3. Click the extension icon in your extensions bar (Pin it for easy access!)
4. Click the start button and watch the number of your pins and followers grow! 

Feel free to leave any feedback here or message me directly on StudyStream
